BackgroundFetchManager.summary: NOTE Experimental The BackgroundFetchManager interface of the is a map where the keys are background fetch IDs and the values are objects.

BackgroundFetchManagerFetch.summary: NOTE Experimental The fetch() method of the interface initiates a background fetch operation, given one or more URLs or objects.
BackgroundFetchManagerFetch.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a object.

BackgroundFetchManagerGet.summary: NOTE Experimental The get() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with the associated with the provided id or if the id is not found.
BackgroundFetchManagerGet.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a or {{jsxref("undefined")}}.

BackgroundFetchManagerGetIds.summary: NOTE Experimental The getIds() method of the interface returns the IDs of all registered background fetches.
BackgroundFetchManagerGetIds.returns: A that resolves with an of .
